scripts.lint: npm run lint:lessons && npm run lint:webassembly && eslint --fix generate.js docs/
scripts.build: node generate.js lessons docs beta && node generate.js wasm docs/webassembly beta
scripts.serve: npm run build && cd docs && python  -m http.server 8080
scripts.watch: nodemon -w lessons/**/* -w wasm/**/* -e yaml --exec npm run serve
